indiya thamilnadu muhudu simawedi athadanguwata path shri lankika dhiwarayan 10 denaku saha yathra 02 k indiya baladharin wisin nidahas kara atha.dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahathage madahath wima matha nidahas kara ganimata haki wu mema dhiwarayan saha yathra mema masa 29 da meratata paminimata niyamithaya.mema wasare aprel masa 13 da migamuwa dhiwara warayen muhudu giya piyumali dhiwara yathrawa saha ehi gaman gath dhiwara karmikayan 05 dena mayi masa 14 dina indiya weralarakshaka balakaya magin athadanguwata gath athara aprel masa 28 da thrikunamalaya dhiwara warayen muhudu giya dhanushka putha -2 dhiwara yathrawa saha ehi gaman gath dhiwara kamikayan 05 dena mese nidahasa labana athara owun mema 29 da kankasanthuredi shri lanka nawika hamudawata bharadimata niyamithaya.mema dhiwarayan nidahasa labimen pasu thawath shri lanka dhiwarayan 17 k saha yathra 03 k pamani .meyin 05 denaku ha solaman-02 namath dhiwara yathrawa thamilnaduweda, thawath dhiwara karmikayan 12 neku ha nathasha duwa -06,kawisha -02 dhiwara yathrawan andra hida athadanguwe pasuweyi.wenath ratawalata ayath muhudu sima ullanghanaya karamin owunge muhudu sampath kollakame yedimen deratema honda hitha paludu nokarana lesa siyaluma dhiwara karmikayangen saha yathra niyamuwangen dhiwara amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahatha yali yalith illa sitina athara dhiwara yathra himikaruwangen da me pilibanda salakilimath wana lesa illa sitiyi..

ee sandaha danuma, aakalpa, kushalathawalin hondatama pohosathya. 1994 jathika adhyapana sewayata awathirna wana siridhamma himiyan anuradhapura nochchiyagama widyadarsha madhya maha widyalaye aacharyawarayaku washayen dushkara sewawaka niratha wi 1989 sita me dakwa diwayine janapriya pasalak wana kolambaa tharstan maha widyalaye dharmacharyawarayaku lesa pathwim laba, thama sanwidhana shakthiyath - nayakathwayath monawata pradarshanaya karamin ema widyalaye niyojya widuhalpathi dhuraya dakwa paminiyeya.

eekata palamu piyawara aanduwa giya sathiyedi gaththa.ee thamayi padika welandun iwath kirima.mokada oya kanu walata ena polithin wadi pramanayak enne welandun athin.hondama udaharane nugegoda lanka bankuwa idiripasa thiyena wathura gala bahina kanuwa.ooka hamadamath pirenne ethana andum welandam karana welandun iwath karana andum otha thiyena polithin kawara walin.eeka nisa nugegoda hatharaman handiyama yata wenawa ( bohowita stanli thilakarathna mawatha hewath rotariya paththata yana para ) wassa dawasata.meka nisa duk windinne pasal yana lamayi saha pare payin gaman karana minissu.ee nisa kasala kalamanakaranaya saha nithimaya nowana sthanawala thiyena welandam iwath kirima athyawashya deyak.
